channel.title: nonWILD
channel.description: can somone help me make a zone from wildy-non wild?

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 )||(absX >=3456 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3249 && absY <=3327 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

item.title: nonWILD
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Ffs… you all told him wrong… I would type how but I’m too lazy, here’s a tutorial from I Br3ndan I

[quote=“I Br3ndan I”]Purpose : To make safezones in Pimpscape and all it’s children, Phonescape etc.

Difficulty : 2/10

Procedure
Step 1 : [i] First of all we need to find the boolean. Search for this in client.java public boolean nonWild

[i]You should see something like this below that if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 )||(absX >=3456 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3249 && absY <=3327 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Step 2 : [i] Now that you’ve found the boolean, we can add the safezone! This is the format you use when making one (absX >= [X Coords here SW] && absX <= [X Coords here NE] && absY >= [Y Coords here SW] && absY <=[Y Coords here NE] ) ||

Step 3 : Save client.java and compile, congratulations on just making a safezone!

Credits : Me and n0vamage

Additional Information : [i] If you didn’t understand step 2, then pay attention!

The way safezones work is… You work out the most SW (South-Western) coords of the area you wan’t to make a safezone and add the X coords in the 1st place, put the Y coords of them in the last one. For the NE (North-Eastern) part of the safezone, you add the X coords of the position in the 2nd place and the 2nd last place.[/i]

Example : Say this square is you’re area that you wan’t to make a safezone.
__________
| | < NE Corner
| |
| |
| |
SW Corner >|________|

You’re adding in the SW corner’s coords and the NE coords so that the ‘safezone box’ can stretch out and cover the full area. Hope you understand now. :rolleyes:

Moderators : You’ll find a tutorial on adding safezones in this section somewhere, there isn’t one for Pimpscape though, only for Testscape and the Testscape tutorial isn’t compatable with Pimpscape so, please think about all the people this might help before attempting to lock it. Please, I’m here to help and help I shall.

There’s one of my old tutorials. Hope it helped. :)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@pa1ntb3ller wrote:

now i got 100 errors -.-[br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2007, 07:48:55 PM[/size][hr]ok i got it down to one error :

public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) if (absY >= 3572 && absY <= 3555 && absX <= 2907 && absX >= 2890) return true; else return false; }

it says

client.java:608: missing return statement
}
note:stream.java uses or overides a deprecated API

item.title: nonWILD
item.dc:creator: @459_expert 459 expert
item.description:
@459_expert wrote:

Please use Code tags, and,

public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) || if (absY >= #### && absY <= #### && absX <= #### && absX >= ####) return true; else return false; } try that. replace the #### with the coords.

item.title: nonWILD
item.dc:creator: @pa1ntb3ller pa1ntb3ller
item.description:
@pa1ntb3ller wrote:

[code]public void setconfig(int settingID, int value) {
outStream.createFrame(36);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(settingID);
outStream.writeByte(value);
}
public void viewTo(int coordX, int coordY) {
viewToX = ((2 * coordX) + 1);
viewToY = ((2 * coordY) + 1);
dirUpdate2Required = true;
updateRequired = true;
}
public boolean nonWild() {
if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112)
return true;
else
return false;
}

public int untradable[] = {3759,6384,3760,3761,3762,3763,3764,3765,3777,3778,3779,3780,3781,3782,3783,3784,3785,3786,3787,3788,3789,3790,773, 5553, 5554, 5555, 5556, 5557, 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048}; // put all untradable itemz here bitchz XD - xero

public boolean isUntradable(int item) {
for(int i = 0; i < untradable.length; i++) {
if(untradable == item)
return true;
}
return false;
}[/code]
